verbs: What is it you truly desire?
Hello, Detective
I am a Devil of my word
Oh, my me!
For Dad's sake!

Trust me, I've been doing this a long time
I know evil
People don't have power over us. We give it to them
What I hate more than anything is a liar
Everyone deserves a second chance. Even me
Desire is truth
Heaven isn't a democracy
I punish those who deserve it
I love L.A.
You're far too interesting to let die
The Devil always keeps his promises
Welcome to Lux
I'm the Devil. I don't lie
Not today, Father
Amenadiel, always a pleasure
Maze, with me
Detective, we have a case
I've got a favor to call in
